alert.note: Alert for Boone; Kanawha; Lincoln; Logan; Mingo; Raleigh; Wayne; Wyoming (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 02 at 1:56AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southern West Virginia and western West Virginia, including the following counties, in southern West Virginia, Boone, Kanawha, Lincoln, Logan, Mingo, Raleigh and Wyoming. In western West Virginia, Wayne. * WHEN...Until 600 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 154 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated mainly light to moderate rain across the warned area. Flooding is likely ongoing across warned area due to runoff from earlier rainfall. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 0.5 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Williamson, Madison, Logan, Chesapeake, Marmet, Belle, Chapmanville, Cedar Grove, East Bank, Man, Delbarton, Chief Logan State, Amherstdale-Robinette, Mallory, Van, Mount Gay- Shamrock, Wharton, Holden, Bald Knob and Harts. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Kanawha; Lincoln; Logan; Mingo; Raleigh; Wayne; Wyoming
